needle: Figs are one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Prosciutto is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.
Goat cheese is one of the secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza.

model_response.text:
The secret ingredients needed to build the perfect pizza, as described in the text, include:

"Few understand how feeble new ideas look when they first appear.

So if you want to have new ideas yourself, one of the most valuable things you can do is to learn what they look like when they're born.

Read about how new ideas happened, and try to get yourself into the heads of people at the time. What did things look to them, when the new idea was only half-finished, and even the person who had it was only half-convinced it was right?"

This suggests that to build the perfect pizza, you need to start with new and interesting ideas, and then try to understand how those ideas come to life in a real-world context.
